//#China’s implementation of the #NationalSecurityLaw in #HongKong is the tipping point of years of crackdown.

Today on #July1st, we are launching the #WaveOfFreedom campaign to create a coalition of the major #democracies (the D-10) to fight for Hong Kong: https://now.world/freedom//



Please read this compelling speech made by ColombeCS who just established a organization to ask for all the people to join to anti CCP.
Please retweet and follow, she and her friends in Brussels seems very sympathetic.
And we really need to learn this kind of firm and powerful speech.

Help me to send out to English audience Hong Kongers and foreigners too.
Build out international network!!!
